Game in a Week (GaW) is a self-imposed challenge to build a bitching prototype for an existing game (preferably a genre-defining one). Itâ€™s an undertaking in which I show that quick prototyping is easy,fun, and can yield great results. I hope both you and I will learn a lot along the way.

We will start by reverse-designing the game. We’ll understand what systems comprise gameplay and what needs to be done in terms of code, tech art, and assets. We will also analyze the gameplay, defining interactions, events, and dynamics.
